original_title: Idaho prosecutor's crucial win kept Kohberger DNA evidence in play | Fox News
article_summary: Idaho prosecutor Jeff Nye successfully defended the use of controversial DNA evidence in the Bryan Kohberger case, overcoming defense challenges and ensuring the evidence could stand despite an FBI policy violation. The DNA evidence, obtained through investigative genetic genealogy, was crucial in identifying Kohberger as a suspect in the murders of four University of Idaho students.</s>
